roleset.name: to disagree, diverging from popular opinion
roleset.note: DISSENT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dissent' based on WSJ; nominal 'dissension' based on BOLT-6. Member of VNcls correspond-36.1. (from dissent.01-v)
DISSENT-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, dissent.01. Corresponds to VNcls correspond-36.1 (from dissent.01-n)
DISSENTION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from dissention.01-n)

example.name: dissent-v: with Arg1
example.text: Fed Vice Chairman Manuel Johnson , who [*T*-98] had dissented from the Treasury 's policy , told lawmakers , `` I became convinced about what [*T*-99]looked to me like an attempt [*] to push the dollar down against the fundamentals in the market . ''
example.arg: who -> Fed Vice Chairman Manuel Johnson

example.name: dissent-v: intransitive
example.text: Britain 's Prime Minister Thatcher alone dissented .

example.name: dissension-n
example.text: And in that moment of existential bliss, Malak solidified his dissention from the Jedi.

example.name: dissent-n: both args
example.text: Does his ?dissent? from ?Catholic Social Teaching? make him not a good Catholic?
